verses.roman:
avatari' prabhu pracārila saṅkīrtana
eho bāhya hetu, pūrve kariyāchi sūcana

synonyms: avatari'-incarnating; prabhu—the Lord; pracārila—propagated; saṅkīrtana—the congregational chanting of the holy name; eho—this; bāhya—external; hetu—reason; pūrve—previously; kariyāchi—I have given; sūcana—indication.
translation: The Lord came to propagate saṅkīrtana. That is an external purpose, as I have already indicated.
